ygData.subject: RE: Armor & Absorption is all AC.
ygData.msgSnippet: I have direct confirmation from Verant that armor type is the Damage Absorption constant. ... Point:  Anyone can state this.  Now give us facts.  What everyone
ygData.messageBody:
I have direct confirmation from Verant that armor type is the Damage
Absorption constant.

:)


Point: Anyone can state this. Now give us facts. What everyone has said
for this thread is only conjecture. And the one thing I have found constant
in EQ is that conjecture = assume (and you know the saying about assume).


> ----------
> From: Insanity[SMTP:insanity@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Monday, July 19, 1999 4:10 PM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: [warriors_eq] Armor & Absorption is all AC.
>
> From: Insanity <insanity@...>
>
> On Mon, 19 Jul 1999 Morix@... wrote:
> > Yes as a matter of fact there is. Regular leather, studded leather, and
>
> > reinforced leather (I believe) all have ths same stats in AC and weight,
> but
> > have incresingly higher damage absorption values. Otherwise, what would
> be
> > the point of studded and reinforced leather?
>
> *grin* I'll try this one more time. Gave up on the last one due to
> closed mindedness.
>
> Studded is identical to Leather but can be created by trade skills. That
> is the advantage to Studded (slight or negligable as it seems).
>
> Reinforced Leather (I believe) has a higher AC and thus is _better_ than
> both normal and Studded Leather.
>
> I have direct confirmation from Verant that AC is the Damage Absorption
> constant. There are no other values for damage absorption hidden.
>
> To maximize damage absorption, maximize AC.
>
> That's just the way it is.
>
> Drew
>
>
